alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 2:44PM CDT until August 06 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN TUSCALOOSA...EAST CENTRAL PICKENS AND EASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 244 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Oakman to 7 miles south of Berry to near Gordo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordo, Berry, Boley Springs, Bankston, Bull City, Samantha, Bankhead Lock And Dam, Lake Lurleen State Park, Binion Creek Landing, Whitson, Lake Tuscaloosa, Moores Bridge, Windham Springs, Sexton Bend, New Lexington, Tierce Pattton Bridge, Lake Nicol, Wiley, Echola and Highway 69 Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
